sentence: Coty Inc. ( COTY ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 26, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.125 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 13, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased COTY prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that COTY has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $18.9, the dividend yield is 2.65%.
The previous trading day's last sale of COTY was $18.9, representing a -37.27% decrease from the 52 week high of $30.13 and a 11.5% increase over the 52 week low of $16.95.
COTY is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
COTY's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$.25.
Zacks Investment Research reports COTY's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as -45.53%, compared to an industry average of 2.9%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the COTY Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
